caption.p: Average values of parameter a in Eq.Â ( 1) for colonies: ( a) on individual species of plants; ( b) average for one year and country for all plants monitored (including trees) ( c) average for one year and country only for herbaceous plants. Different letters above the columns in ( a) and inside the columns in ( b) and ( c) indicate significantly different values (Tukey HSD test). Vertical bars indicate SD.
